short_summary: Supply and delivery of a drive on dock to support operational and training obligations.
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the supply and delivery of a drive on dock. HMCS DISCOVERY has a mandate to provide operational and training capabilities to the Royal Canadian Navy. There is a critical requirement to have drive-on-dock capability to support its operational and translation obligations. All the deliverables must be received on or before June 23, 2023. Assembly and installation to be conducted in accordance with the Statement of Work at HMCS DISCOVERY 1200 Stanley Park Drive Vancouver, BC V6G 3E2.

full_summary:
# W02D1-23G425 - Drive on Dock Tender Announcement
## Tender Information
| Field        | Value                                  |
|--------------|----------------------------------------|
| Ref. Number  | WS3745274647-Doc3907300968            |
| Amend. Number| 1                                     |
| Publ. Date   | March 7, 2023                          |
| Clos. Date   | April 11, 2023 (14:00:00)              |
| Unspsc       | *Commercial marine craft                 *Vessel docking services |
|              | *Navires commerciaux                     *Services d'amarrage des bateaux|

## Tender Information
A Request for Proposal (RFP) entitled "Drive on Dock" with reference number WS3745274647-Doc3907300968 is issued by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of HMCS Discovery for the supply and delivery of a modular dock system. The bid should be submitted by speaking to one of the contractors at the end of this entry.

## Description
The Maritime Forces Pacific are responsible for providing operational and training capabilities to the Royal Canadian Navy. The requirement is to provide a  modular dock system that can be used to service HDMS Discovery and take up space until end of contract.
Delivery should take place at the Discovery's homeport at 1200 Stanley Park Drive Vancouver, BC, engulang at the end of all delivery.

## Important Details
  - Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
  - End-user Entity: Department of National Defence (DND)
  - Regions of delivery: British Columbia
  - Notice URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15624422
  - Contact Information:
    | Field     | Value                    |
    |-----------|--------------------------|
    | Contact    | Mary Parsons             |
    | Email      | mary.parsons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca|

Note: The tender announcement expired, however a new set of contractors can always reach out.

[Contact Information]
If you are interested in bidding, please contact Mary Parsons at mary.parsons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca to access more resources. Attachments below are also available if required.
